Module org.firebirdsql.jaybird

Package org.firebirdsql.jaybird.util

@InternalApi @NullMarked package org.firebirdsql.jaybird.util
Utility classes which are strictly for use within Jaybird itself.
Since:
6
Author:
Mark Rotteveel
